title: Minecraft: Pocket Edition
summary: Minecraft is about placing blocks to build things and going on adventures!
description: Our latest free update, The Ender Update, includes The End and its iconic ultimate boss battle, the Ender Dragon. And don't miss the first ever Mash-Up to come to this edition, complete with a Festive skin pack, texture pack, and world.Explore randomly generated worlds and build amazing things from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the world in survival mode, crafting weapons and armor to fend off the dangerous mobs.Craft, create, and explore alone, or with friends on mobile devices or Windows 10.
descriptionHTML:
Our latest free update, The Ender Update, includes The End and its iconic ultimate boss battle, the Ender Dragon. And don't miss the first ever Mash-Up to come to this edition, complete with a Festive skin pack, texture pack, and world.

Explore randomly generated worlds and build amazing things from the simplest of homes to the grandest of castles. Play in creative mode with unlimited resources or mine deep into the world in survival mode, crafting weapons and armor to fend off the dangerous mobs.

Craft, create, and explore alone, or with friends on mobile devices or Windows 10.
comments: I wish on my phone it worked better but on everything else i love it me and my Dad built a farm i hope i can meet you guys so you can play with me but i hope you like it and thanks for making it free on my ipad its pretty cool so yeah thanks guys i am happy to say A BIG FAT THANK YOU!!!!! But it should not use any storage i can not get it on my phone so my stupid HUAWEI phone does nothing at all SO FIX IT!!!!!

I play this game every ingle day and have some of my favourite world's with redstone and fun builds. Me and my best friend love to join world's and build amazing structures I definitely recommend this game. Just please can you add pistons, becons and colored glass please... I am quite disappointed because the last couple of updates are just skins! I still love this game but improve the game not the skins.

Its now required to have an internet connection to play with someone who right in front of you. And most of the time even though we're connected to our own hotspot or our own network  we can't find each other. if they simplify it and make so that we can play offline I'll change my rating until then I don't recommend that you buy this

I like it, but with this new update (1.0.5) it deleted all of my severs that i am on and it changed my skin to the default. The game also changed my gamer tag back to Steve. Why did this happen? Other then that i love the game! It's addicting, fun, and it allows players to be creative!

Add every block/mob that minecraft pc into minecraft pe please please please. If you do 5 stars ☆☆☆☆☆ forever. Includes: armour stands, stained glass, command BLOCKs, mods, wither storm,  book and quill (write able book), custom elytra, shulker chest, custom trading (chest under villagers left is trade for right is gets and it for the chest then villager trades that), ....etc. =D and MY SERVERSSSSSSSS =(

One of the most addicting games I've ever played, a great time killer! Definitely worth the $7. I am patiently waiting for any new update to be released! I highly recommend this game to all ages! A bit of nostalgia with the 3d pixel graphics, aswell. There are options to switch it for lefties, too!
recentChanges: Our latest update includes the new Power Rangers skin pack!
